Posts.Content: Lorett wrote:   So new to this chat room.   Not sure if anyone has had this happen - after the lumpectomy my surgeon told me the tumor was not solid.  He said it was spongey.  He ended up taking more tissue than expected.  Has anyone ever gotten this response - if so what was the outcome.  Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: What mass??? Lorett Lorett
